metadata.Title: CVE-2019-13139 on Ubuntu 14.04 ESM (trusty) - untriaged
metadata.Description: In Docker before 18.09.4, an attacker who is capable of supplying ormanipulating the build path for the "docker build" command would be able togain command execution. An issue exists in the way "docker build" processesremote git URLs, and results in command injection into the underlying "gitclone" command, leading to code execution in the context of the userexecuting the "docker build" command. This occurs because git ref can bemisinterpreted as a flag.

criterions.comment: docker.io: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support').
